bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [Launchpad] Unit Test Fail in aarch64, arm32, x86_32.
bug.description:
Related Log: <denchmark-link:https://launchpadlibrarian.net/398472092/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-i386.nnstreamer_0.0.3-0~201811210943~ubuntu18.04.1_BUILDING.txt.gz>https://launchpadlibrarian.net/398472092/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-i386.nnstreamer_0.0.3-0~201811210943~ubuntu18.04.1_BUILDING.txt.gz</denchmark-link>
If you request me, I can give you the access previleges to the launchpad recipe.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/877>#877</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Or we can test with gbs: <denchmark-code>$ gbs build -A i586 --define "unit_test 1" --spec nnstreamer.spec </denchmark-code>

i586 error in Tizen: due to recent update in opencv at Tizen:Unified arm64/arm32 error in Tizen/Ubuntu: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/882>#882</denchmark-link>
i586 error in Ubuntu: to be investigated further.
i586@Tizen : Resolved (fix submitted to Tizen:Unified and being reviewed) arm64/arm32: Resolved Remaining: i386@Ubuntu. Mysterious. (OpenCV in Ubuntu i386 appears to have the same issue... wth..)
